name: tessel
description: Mix functional reactive programming with immutable cursors for handling application state.

scripts.build-global: rm -rf build/global && NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js build/global/tessel.js && NODE_ENV=production COMPRESS=1 webpack src/index.js build/global/tessel.min.js && echo "gzipped, the global build is `gzip -c build/global/tessel.min.js | wc -c` bytes"

author: Aitor Oses
